title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected Behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selected item should be highlighted without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
